gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `DesignatedFund` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `DesignatedFund` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `DesignatedFundMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedFundEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedFundEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedFundStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedFundStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedFundMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedFundMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DesignatedFundMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_DesignatedFundMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_DesignatedFundMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedFundMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedFundMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedFundMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedFundMovementSpecificationNonprofit_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedFundMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
